push_em.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !     3v particle pusher
00004 !
00005 !  TM fields only (s-pol):  (0,0,Ez)  (Bx,By,0)
00006 !  TE fields to follow (Ex,Ey,0) (0,0,Bz)
00007 !  ==============================================
00008 
00009 
00010 subroutine push_em(p_start,p_finish,dts)
00011   use physvars
00012   use treevars
00013   implicit none
00014   integer, intent(in) :: p_start, p_finish
00015   real, intent(in) :: dts
00016   integer :: p
00017   real :: beta, gam2,gam1,tt,sx, sy, sz, tz, ty, tx
00018   real :: uxd,uyp,uzp,uxp,uxm,uym,uzm,uzn1
00019   real :: exi, eyi, ezi, bxi, byi, bzi
00020   real :: phipon, ez_em, by_em, az_em, xd, yd, zd
00021 
00022 
00023   if (itime>0 .and. beam_config==4) focus(1) = x_crit  ! laser tracks n_c
00024 
00025   do p = p_start, p_finish
00026      beta=q(p)/m(p)*dts*0.5  ! charge/mass constant
00027 
00028      xd = x(p)-focus(1)
00029      yd = y(p)-focus(2)
00030      zd = z(p)-focus(3)
00031 
00032      ! evaluate external fields at particle positions
00033 
00034      if (beam_config.eq.4) then
00035 ! pond. standing wave on step-profile
00036         call empond(tlaser,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,xd,yd,zd,ez_em,by_em,az_em,phipon)
00037 
00038      else if (beam_config.eq.6) then
00039 ! plane wave with Gaussian spot
00040         call emplane(tlaser,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,xd,yd,zd,ez_em,by_em,az_em,phipon)
00041      endif
00042 
00043      !  Sum internal and external fields
00044      exi = ex(p)
00045      eyi = ey(p)
00046      ezi = ez(p)+ez_em
00047      bxi = 0.
00048      byi = by_em
00049      bzi = 0.
00050 
00051      ! transverse momentum from pz=az including thermal motion 
00052      !  uzi = -q(p)/m(p)*az_em + uz(p)
00053 
00054 
00055      !   first half-accn
00056      uxm = ux(p) + beta*exi
00057      uym = uy(p) + beta*eyi
00058      uzm = uz(p) + beta*ezi
00059      !     uzm = uz(p) - q(p)/m(p)*az_em
00060      !   rotation
00061      gam1=dsqrt(1.d0 + uxm**2 + uym**2 + uzm**2)
00062      ty = beta*byi/gam1
00063      tz = beta*bzi/gam1
00064      tt = 1.0 + ty**2+tz**2
00065      sy = 2.0*ty/tt
00066      sz = 2.0*tz/tt
00067 
00068      uxd = uxm + uym*tz - uzm*ty
00069      uyp = uym - uxd*sz
00070      uzp = uzm + uxd*sy
00071      uxp = uxd + uyp*tz - uzp*ty
00072 
00073      !   second half-accn
00074      ux(p) = uxp + beta*exi
00075      uy(p) = uyp + beta*eyi
00076      uz(p) = uzp + beta*ezi
00077 
00078   end do
00079 
00080 
00081 end subroutine push_em
